attributes.action: ban John Prescott from passing wind thus creating a more healthy atmosphere.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Blair should impose a ban on his deputy from passing wind. This would result in cleaner air for people to breathe, less 'Brown Cloud' formation and should also spare the foundations of buildings from rocking.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
